summary.span: 作為充當目錄之所有區域控制項的基底類別。

span.span: Serves as the base class for all zone controls that act as catalogs.

summary.span: 目錄包含 控制項的清單，使用者可以將這些控制項加入網頁。

span.span: Catalogs contain lists of controls that users can add to a Web page.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別是基底類別繼承自類別。The class is a base class that inherits from the class. 它提供一組基本的行為衍生的區域。It provides a base set of behaviors for derived zones. 類別提供唯一的使用者介面 (UI)，可讓使用者加入控制項和其他伺服器控制項加入網頁。The class provides a unique user interface (UI) that enables users to add controls and other server controls to Web pages. 衍生自的類別，例如，是實際放在網頁的控制項。Controls that derive from the class, such as , are the controls actually placed on Web pages. 它們是做為其他控制項稱為容器建立清單的使用者新增至網頁的伺服器控制項的控制項。They act as containers for other controls, known as controls, that create lists of server controls for users to add to a page. 衍生自區域類別可以出現只有當頁面處於目錄顯示模式。Zones that derive from the class can appear only when the page is in catalog display mode. > [!NOTE] > A只能包含區域控制項和相反地，控制項可以只在位於區域。A zone can contain only controls, and conversely, controls can reside only in zones. 將伺服器控制項加入至類別目錄的機制是下列三個控制項衍生自基底的一組類別。The mechanism for adding server controls to a catalog is the following set of three controls that derive from the base class. |控制項Control|描述Description| |-------------|-----------------| ||維護參考至頁面已關閉的控制項。Maintains references to controls that have been closed on a page. 這些控制項可以由使用者重新開啟 （已重新新增到網頁）。These controls can be reopened (added back to the page) by users.| ||包含控制項中的 Web 組件類別目錄，在網頁標記中宣告的參考。Contains references to controls that are declared in a Web Parts catalog in the markup of a Web page. 這些控制項可以由使用者加入至 Web 網頁。These controls can be added to a Web page by users.| ||提供使用者定義檔案上載至目錄，好讓控制項可以加入至網頁的 UI。Provides the UI for a user to upload a definition file to a catalog so that the control can be added to a Web page. 定義檔案是 XML 檔案。Web 組件檔案名稱副檔名，匯入設定的控制項。Definition files are XML file with a .WebPart file name extension that import settings for a control. 可以匯入定義檔案之前，控制項必須要有伺服器上。The control must be present on the server before the definition file can be imported.| 類別具有許多屬性都適用於顯示類別目錄中，控制項。The class has a number of properties that are useful for displaying catalogs of controls. 屬性會參考從類別目錄選取的控制項加入頁面中，動詞命令時屬性參考的動詞命令關閉目錄，並傳回至瀏覽模式的頁面的顯示模式。The property references the verb that adds a selected control from the catalog to the page, while the property references a verb that closes the catalog and returns the page's display mode to browse mode. 屬性參考的所有集合區域中的控制項。The property references the collection of all controls in the zone. 文字導向的數個屬性，例如， ，和，覆寫基底屬性，以提供適用於類別目錄的預設文字。Several text-oriented properties, such as , , and , override base properties to provide default text appropriate for catalogs. 屬性包含旁的下拉式清單控制項可讓使用者選擇哪一個區域的控制項將會加入至文字。The property contains the text alongside the drop-down list control that allows users to choose which zone a control will be added to. 數個其他屬性都包含在類別。Several other properties are included in the class. 屬性是目前選取的唯一字串識別碼控制項。The property is a unique string identifier for the currently selected control. 屬性會指出是否顯示可以藉由設定與控制項相關聯的圖示屬性控制項。The property indicates whether to show the icons that can be associated with controls by setting the property on a control. 屬性包含連結的樣式屬性目前未選取的區域中的控制項。The property contains style attributes for the links to the controls that are not currently selected in the zone. 相反地，屬性包含樣式屬性的連結，以使用者目前選取的區域中的控制項。In contrast, the property contains style attributes for a link to the control that the user has currently selected in the zone. 除了屬性之外，另外還有中的某些方法類別，除了標準的事件處理和轉譯方法繼承自其他基底控制項，唯一專為了處理之類別目錄控制項。In addition to the properties, there are also some methods in the class, in addition to the standard event-handling and rendering methods inherited from other base controls, which are uniquely designed for the purpose of handling catalogs of controls. 方法會建立括住每個色彩 （週邊 UI 項目例如框線、 動詞命令、 圖示和標題）區域中的控制項，也會處理控制項的轉譯。The method creates the chrome (peripheral UI elements such as a border, verbs, icons, and a title) that surrounds each control in the zone, and also handles the rendering for the controls. 方法抽象方法，衍生的類別覆寫它建立的所有執行個體區域內包含的控制項。The method is an abstract method; derived classes override it to create instances of all the controls contained in the zone. 如果，可以由衍生類別呼叫方法的集合區域變更，針對某些程式設計的原因，並在衍生的類別中的控制項需要重新建立集合。The method can be called by a derived class if the collection of controls in the zone changes for some programmatic reason, and the derived class needs to recreate the collection. 方法會將載入的原有狀態核取方塊旁的 控制項在目錄中，每當頁面回傳至伺服器; 相反地，方法儲存狀態的核取方塊。The method loads the previously existing state for the check boxes next to the controls in the catalog, whenever the page is posted back to the server; conversely, the method saves the state of the check boxes. 最後，方法提供給每個連結的所有呈現區域內包含的控制項。Finally, the method provides all the rendering for the links to each control contained in the zone. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會示範數個宣告式和以程式設計方式使用類別。The following code example demonstrates several declarative and programmatic uses of the class. 類別是抽象的因為程式碼範例會使用衍生隨附於 Web 組件控制項集合的屬性和它所繼承的方法，來示範類別類別。Because the class is abstract, the code examples use the derived class that ships with the Web Parts control set, demonstrating the properties and methods that it inherits from the class. 程式碼範例包含四個部分：The code example has four parts: - 使用者控制項，可讓您變更在網頁上的顯示模式。A user control that enables you to change display modes on the Web page. - Web 網頁，其中包含參考控制項，而某些程式碼示範一些索引鍵的用法類別成員。A Web page that contains a reference to a control, and some code that demonstrates usage of some key class members. - 自訂已加入至自訂控制項控制項。A custom control that is added to the custom control. - 此範例在瀏覽器中的運作方式的描述。A description of how the example works in a browser. 這個程式碼範例的第一個部分是使用者控制項，可讓您變更在頁面上的顯示模式。The first part of this code example is the user control that enables you to change display modes on the page. 如需詳細資料會顯示此控制項中模式和原始碼的說明，請參閱[逐步解說： 變更 Web 組件頁面上顯示的模式](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/24e42f74-82dc-4c13-8574-130398985fc0)。For details about display modes and a description of the source code in this control, see [Walkthrough: Changing Display Modes on a Web Parts Page](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/24e42f74-82dc-4c13-8574-130398985fc0). [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_CatalogZoneBase_Overview#8](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_CatalogZoneBase_Overview/CS/displaymodemenucs.ascx#8)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_CatalogZoneBase_Overview#8](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_CatalogZoneBase_Overview/VB/displaymodemenuvb.ascx#8)] 程式碼範例的第二個部分是包含的宣告式參考的網頁控制項。The second part of the code example is a Web page that contains a declarative reference to a control. 在頁面頂端附近是兩個`Register`指示詞-一個用於的使用者控制項，而另一個用於自訂控制項。Near the top of the page are two `Register` directives--one for the user control, and one for the custom control. 請注意以下``項目是``包含自訂的宣告式參考的項目控制項，以及 ASP.NET控制項。Notice that below the `` element is an `` element that contains declarative references to the custom control, and to an ASP.NET control. 區域也會有各種不同的標記和屬性設定為決定其外觀和行為。The zone also has a variety of tags and properties set to determine its appearance and behavior. 之間`

para.span: 如果您想要開發自訂的區域，用於裝載控制項，您必須判斷您是否要提供區域範本支援。

span.span: If you want to develop a custom zone for hosting controls, you must determine whether you want to provide zone template support.

para.span: 區域範本由實作的型別介面，而且不需要如果您想要讓網頁開發人員使用您的自訂區域，來參考在您的區域，在網頁上的宣告式標記內的控制項。

span.span: A zone template is created by types that implement the interface, and is necessary if you want to enable page developers using your custom zone to reference controls within your zone in the declarative markup of a Web page.

para.span: 如果您需要的範本支援的區域，您應該繼承自類別。

span.span: If you need zone template support, you should inherit from the class.

para.span: 相反地，如果您的自訂區域，並將其控制項將會各自獨立，而且則不使用任何網頁程式開發人員在區域範本中，以宣告方式指定控制項的選項會以程式設計方式建立，則您可以直接繼承從類別。

span.span: In contrast, if your custom zone and its controls are going to be self-contained, and they will be created programmatically without any options for page developers to specify controls declaratively in a zone template, then you can inherit directly from the class.

para.span: 如果您繼承自類別，您必須覆寫方法，並加入或您想要您目錄中其他伺服器控制項物件。

span.span: If you inherit from the class, you must override the method, and add the or other server controls you want in your catalog to a object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當在衍生的類別初始化時，例如呼叫建構函式類別提供的 Web 組件控制項集合。The constructor is called when a derived class is initialized, such as the class provided with the Web Parts control set. 基底準備頁面以顯示 Web 組件類別目錄的使用者介面 (UI)，藉由傳遞適當的建構函式可協助物件控制項。The base constructor helps prepare the page to display the Web Parts catalog user interface (UI), by passing the appropriate object to the control. 具體來說，建構函式傳遞物件。Specifically, the constructor passes a object.

summary.span: 取得 物件的參考，這個物件可讓使用者從目錄加入控制項至 Web 組件頁面。

span.span: Gets a reference to a object that enables end users to add controls from a catalog to a Web Parts page.

value.span: ，可以讓使用者從目錄加入控制項至 Web 網頁。

span.span: A that enables end users to add controls from the catalog to a Web page.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 加入動詞命令由參考在控制項上的屬性衍生自類別。The add verb is referenced by the property on a control derived from the class. 加入動詞命令新增使用者選取類別目錄至網頁中的控制項。The add verb adds a control that an end user has selected in the catalog to a Web page. 一般而言，加入動詞命令會顯示在使用者介面 (UI) 中為控制，雖然也可以是連結或影像。Typically, the add verb appears in the user interface (UI) as a control, although it can also be a link or an image. 加入動詞命令是一個區域層級控制項，這表示，雖然可能有數個目錄中的控制項，加入動詞命令適用於使用者所選取的所有控制項，然後將它們加入選取的區域。The add verb is a zone-level control, meaning that although there might be several controls in the catalog, the add verb applies to all the controls selected by the user and adds them to the selected zone. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何存取屬性以宣告方式和以程式設計的方式。The following code example demonstrates how to access the property both declaratively and programmatically. 若要執行範例所需的完整程式碼，請參閱 < 範例 > 一節的類別概觀。For the full code required to run the example, see the Example section of the class overview. 第一個部分的程式碼範例示範如何存取以宣告方式在網頁中的屬性。The first part of the code example shows how to access the property declaratively in a Web page. 這個範例會自訂動詞命令的文字。This example customizes the text for the verb. [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_CatalogZoneBase_Overview#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_CatalogZoneBase_Overview/CS/catalogzonebasecs.aspx#2)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_CatalogZoneBase_Overview#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_CatalogZoneBase_Overview/VB/catalogzonebasevb.aspx#2)] 此範例的第二個部分示範如何存取屬性以程式設計方式，利用切換按鈕以啟用或停用它。The second part of the example shows how to access the property programmatically, by using a toggle button to enable or disable it. [!code-csharp[WebParts_CatalogZoneBase_Overview#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_CatalogZoneBase_Overview/CS/catalogzonebasecs.aspx#3)] [!code-vb[WebParts_CatalogZoneBase_Overview#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_CatalogZoneBase_Overview/VB/catalogzonebasevb.aspx#3)] 當您載入瀏覽器中的時，您可以選取**目錄**從下拉式清單，切換到 類別目錄的顯示模式。When you load the page in a browser, you can select **Catalog** from the drop-down list to switch to catalog display mode. 顯示類別目錄時，您可以檢查自訂的文字在控制項加入動詞命令，而且您可以按一下**啟用或停用的動詞命令**按鈕，以示範您可以透過程式設計方式存取套用動詞命令。When the catalog is visible, you can examine the customized text on the control for the add verb, and you can click the **Enable or Disable Verbs** button to demonstrate that you can access the apply verb programmatically.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當呼叫方法時，它會建立一個執行個體類別，而這個執行個體用來呈現週邊設備的使用者介面 (UI) 項目 （也稱為 chrome） 所有區域中的控制項。When the method is called, it creates one instance of the class, and this instance is used to render the peripheral user interface (UI) elements (also called the chrome) for all controls in a zone. Chrome 項目，個別控制項包含其框線和標題的文字。The chrome elements for an individual control include its border and title text. 隨附 Web 組件控制項集合的控制項預設沒有標頭指令動詞。The controls provided with the Web Parts control set do not have header verbs by default.

span.span: A that contains all the individual controls in a zone.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性提供所有的集合參考區域中的控制項。The property provides a reference to a collection of all the controls in the zone. 它會參考兩者提供 Web 組件控制項集合，以及任何自訂控制項新增至區域的控制項。It references both the controls provided with the Web Parts control set, and any custom controls that are added to the zone. 另一種方法來存取時，一開始建立集合屬性和屬性呼叫方法。The collection is initially created when another method accesses the property, and the property calls the method. > [!NOTE] > 請注意任何加入至集合的的實作中的控制項方法必須有指派給它的 ID 屬性的值，否則將會擲回例外狀況集合指派給屬性。Note that any that is added to the collection of controls in an implementation of the method must have a value assigned to its ID property, otherwise an exception will be thrown when the collection is assigned to the property. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何存取屬性以程式設計的方式。The following code example demonstrates how to access the property programmatically. 若要執行範例所需的完整程式碼，請參閱 < 範例 > 一節的類別概觀。For the full code required to run the example, see the Example section of the class overview. 程式碼範例示範如何存取屬性，逐一查看集合，並列出所有識別碼區域中的控制項。The code example shows how to access the property, iterate through the collection, and list the IDs of all the controls in the zone. [!code-csharp[WebParts_CatalogZoneBase_Overview#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_CatalogZoneBase_Overview/CS/catalogzonebasecs.aspx#4)] [!code-vb[WebParts_CatalogZoneBase_Overview#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_CatalogZoneBase_Overview/VB/catalogzonebasevb.aspx#4)] 當您載入瀏覽器中的時，您可以選取**目錄**從下拉式清單，切換到 類別目錄的顯示模式。When you load the page in a browser, you can select **Catalog** from the drop-down list to switch to catalog display mode. 顯示類別目錄時，您可以按一下**清單它**按鈕，以示範如何才能存取內容。When the catalog is visible, you can click the **List CatalogParts** button to demonstrate how the property can be accessed.

span.span: A that enables end users to close the catalog UI on the Web page.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 關閉的動詞命令由參考在控制項上的屬性衍生自類別。The close verb is referenced by the property on a control derived from the class. 使用者可以按一下區域頁尾中關閉的動詞命令。User can click the close verb in the zone footer. 當使用者按一下關閉的動詞命令，任何使用者選取的控制項都會被忽略，目錄 UI 隨即關閉，而傳回至一般的瀏覽模式的網頁。When the user clicks the close verb, any controls the user has selected are ignored, the catalog UI closes, and the page returns to normal browse mode. 關閉的動詞命令是一個區域層級控制項，這表示它的動作適用於整個區域的層級。The close verb is a zone-level control, meaning that its action applies at the level of the whole zone. 當使用者按一下關閉動詞命令時，會忽略任何已選取但不是會加入至網頁的控制項、 類別目錄會關閉，而傳回至瀏覽模式的網頁。When a user clicks the close verb, any controls that have been selected but not added to the page are ignored, the catalog is closed, and the page returns to browse mode. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何存取屬性以宣告方式和以程式設計的方式。The following code example demonstrates how to access the property both declaratively and programmatically. 若要執行範例所需的完整程式碼，請參閱 < 範例 > 一節的類別概觀。For the full code required to run the example, see the Example section of the class overview. 第一個部分的程式碼範例示範如何存取以宣告方式在網頁中的屬性。The first part of the code example shows how to access the property declaratively in a Web page. 這個範例自訂動詞命令的屬性。This example customizes the property for the verb. [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_CatalogZoneBase_Overview#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_CatalogZoneBase_Overview/CS/catalogzonebasecs.aspx#2)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_CatalogZoneBase_Overview#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_CatalogZoneBase_Overview/VB/catalogzonebasevb.aspx#2)] 此範例的第二個部分示範如何存取屬性以程式設計方式，利用切換按鈕以啟用或停用它。The second part of the example shows how to access the property programmatically, by using a toggle button to enable or disable it. [!code-csharp[WebParts_CatalogZoneBase_Overview#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_CatalogZoneBase_Overview/CS/catalogzonebasecs.aspx#3)] [!code-vb[WebParts_CatalogZoneBase_Overview#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_CatalogZoneBase_Overview/VB/catalogzonebasevb.aspx#3)] 當您載入瀏覽器中的時，您可以選取**目錄**從下拉式清單，切換到 類別目錄的顯示模式。When you load the page in a browser, you can select **Catalog** from the drop-down list to switch to catalog display mode. 類別目錄時，滑鼠指標放置**關閉** 按鈕，您可以看到工具提示 中的描述文字。When the catalog is visible, by positioning your mouse pointer over the **Close** button, you can see its description text in a ToolTip. 您也可以按一下**啟用或停用的動詞命令**按鈕，以示範您可以透過程式設計方式存取關閉的動詞命令。You can also click the **Enable or Disable Verbs** button to demonstrate that you can access the close verb programmatically.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法沒有提供實作。The method provides no implementation. 它用來在衍生類別中實作，應該用來建立集合的執行個體只要裝載的 Web 網頁進入目錄模式區域時，所包含的控制項。It is intended to be implemented in a derived class, and should be used to create an instance of the collection of controls contained in a zone, whenever the hosting Web page enters catalog mode. 方法提供實作的其中一個範例方法。The method provides one example of an implementation of the method. > [!NOTE] > 請注意任何加入至集合的的實作中的控制項方法必須有指派給它的 ID 屬性的值，否則將會擲回例外狀況集合指派給屬性。Note that any that is added to the collection of controls in an implementation of the method must have a value assigned to its ID property, otherwise an exception will be thrown when the collection is assigned to the property. 這個方法可以建立從數個來源的控制項： 宣告中的持續性格式的控制項控制項或在不同的儲存機制，例如 XML 檔案或資料庫中保存的控制項。The method can create the controls from several sources: controls that are declared in persistence format within a control, or controls that are persisted in various storage mechanisms, such as an XML file or a database.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在區域，連結會顯示每一種控制項： ， ，和。In a zone, links are displayed for each type of control: , , and . 當使用者按一下其中一個連結，對應控制項成為選取的控制項，並顯示該選取的控制項所包含的子控制項。When a user clicks one of the links, the corresponding control becomes the selected control, and the child controls contained by that selected control become visible. 所參考物件屬性包含的樣式屬性目前未選取的控制項。The object referenced by the property contains the style attributes for the controls that are not currently selected. 雖然屬性所參考的物件是唯讀，但您仍可用它來設定基礎的樣式特性，如未選取控制項。Although the object referenced by the property is read-only, you can still use it to set the underlying style characteristics for the unselected controls. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用屬性以宣告方式和程式設計的方式。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property declaratively and programmatically. 若要執行範例所需的完整程式碼，請參閱 < 範例 > 一節的類別概觀。For the full code required to run the example, see the Example section of the class overview. 請注意，程式碼範例的第一個部分會宣告兩個``元素和第一個宣告的值屬性。Notice that the first part of the code example declares two `` elements, and the first one declares a value for the property. [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_CatalogZoneBase_Overview#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_CatalogZoneBase_Overview/CS/catalogzonebasecs.aspx#2)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_CatalogZoneBase_Overview#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_CatalogZoneBase_Overview/VB/catalogzonebasevb.aspx#2)] 在第二個部分的程式碼範例中，文字色彩為未選取控制項設定為不同的值。In the second part of the code example, the text color for the unselected controls is set to a different value. [!code-csharp[WebParts_CatalogZoneBase_Overview#7](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_CatalogZoneBase_Overview/CS/catalogzonebasecs.aspx#7)] [!code-vb[WebParts_CatalogZoneBase_Overview#7](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_CatalogZoneBase_Overview/VB/catalogzonebasevb.aspx#7)] 當您載入瀏覽器中的時，您可以選取**目錄**從下拉式清單，切換到 類別目錄的顯示模式。When you load the page in a browser, you can select **Catalog** from the drop-down list to switch to catalog display mode. 顯示類別目錄時，會注意到未選取的樣式屬性區域中所列的控制項 (根據預設，所選控制項是控制項)。When the catalog is visible, notice the style attributes of the unselected controls listed in the zone (by default, the selected control is the control). 您可以按一下**變更組件連結樣式**按鈕來變更未選取控制項的文字色彩。You can click the **Change Part Link Styles** button to change the text color of the unselected controls. 您也可以按一下未選取的控制項，以查看選取控制項時，樣式屬性如何變更的連結。You can also click the links for the unselected controls, to see how the style attributes change when a control is selected.

summary.span: 執行與其中一個區域動詞命令相關聯的動作，或引發回傳至伺服器的事件。

span.span: Carries out the actions associated with one of the zone verbs, or raises an event that posts back to the server.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果`eventArgument`參數資料表示，已按一下加入動詞命令或關閉的動詞命令，然後在方法執行動作相關聯的動詞命令，例如新增控制項頁面上，或關閉目錄。If the `eventArgument` parameter data indicates that the add verb or the close verb was clicked, then the method carries out the action associated with the verb, such as adding controls to the page, or closing the catalog. 如果其他原因正在呼叫的方法，引發回傳至伺服器事件叫用基底方法。If the method is being called for any other reason, then the base method is invoked to raise a postback event to the server.

para.span: 如果您想要新增自訂動詞區域，您需要覆寫方法以處理事件，若使用者按一下自訂動詞命令。

span.span: If you want to add custom verbs to a zone, you need to override the method to handle the event if a user clicks a custom verb.

summary.span: 將區域呈現至指定的 物件。

span.span: Renders the zone to the specified object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法會覆寫基底方法，從類別來呼叫方法，它會驗證 HTML 表單，會在執行階段區域控制項的轉譯。The method overrides the base method from the class to call the method, which verifies that an HTML form is rendered for the zone control at run time. 驗證之後，方法就會呈現該區域的其餘內容。After the verification, the method then renders the remaining contents of the zone.

summary.span: 覆寫基底方法以呈現繼承自 類別之區域的主體區域。

span.span: Overrides the base method to render the body area of a zone derived from the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法呈現的主體區域區域使用，這是主要內容區域的頁首和頁尾區域之間，並包含控制項。The method renders the body area of a zone, which is the main content area between the header and footer areas and contains controls. 方法會覆寫中的基底方法類別，以提供位址配置和樣式的特定的轉譯屬性 (attribute) 只會套用到區域。The method overrides the base method in the class to provide specialized rendering that addresses layout and style attributes that apply only to zones. 方法會呈現資料表，其中包含主體的整個內容，並在該資料表中，設定不同的屬性值，依據各種條件，包括多少控制項是在區域中。The method renders a table that contains the entire contents of the body, and within that table, it sets different attribute values depending on various conditions, including how many controls are in the zone. 如果有多個控制項的每個控制項，會建立連結，和會顯示目前選定控制項的內容。If there are multiple controls, a link is created for each control, and only the contents of the currently selected control are displayed. 特殊的樣式屬性會設定針對選取的屬性對照目前未選取的控制項。Special style attributes are set in the property for the selected control versus the ones that are not currently selected. 如果有任何區域中的控制項方法呈現的值屬性。If there are no controls in the zone, the method renders the value of the property.

summary.span: 呈現 區域中個別 控制項的連結。

span.span: Renders the links to the individual controls in a zone.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法呈現連結至個別控制區域中，如果有多個控制項。The method renders links to the individual controls in a zone if there are multiple controls. 目前選取的連結要呈現控制項以不同的方式，以便未選取的控制項突出。The link for the currently selected control is rendered differently so that it stands out from the unselected controls. 開發人員可以使用設定選取和取消選取控制連結的樣式屬性和屬性，分別。Developers can set the style attributes for the selected and unselected control links by using the and properties, respectively. 若要連結區域中的控制項不是導覽; 它們是用來顯示控制項的使用者介面 (UI)。The links to the controls in a zone are not navigational; they are for displaying the user interface (UI) of the controls. 當使用者按一下控制項的連結時，任何其他顯示控制項的 UI 隱藏的並會顯示所選控制項的 UI。When a user clicks the link for a control, the UI for any other displayed control is hidden, and the UI for the selected control is displayed.

para.span: 如果您建立自訂的類別繼承自類別，您可以選擇覆寫方法。

span.span: If you create a custom class that inherits from the class, you can optionally override the method.

para.span: 這個方法可讓您以程式設計方式控制如何連結至呈現您的區域中的控制項。

span.span: This method gives you programmatic control over how the links to controls in your zone are rendered.

summary.span: 呈現 區域的頁尾區域。

span.span: Renders the footer area for a zone.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 頁尾區域是區域包含的區域層級動詞命令，例如加入動詞命令和關閉的動詞命令的右下區域。The footer of a zone is the bottom area of the zone that contains the zone-level verbs such as the add verb and the close verb. 在基礎標記中，頁尾是只是以 HTML 表格儲存格。In the underlying markup, a footer is simply a cell in an HTML table. 方法會先建立頁尾的樣式屬性，然後呼叫呈現新增並關閉動詞命令的方法。The method first creates the style attributes for the footer, and then calls the method to render the add and close verbs.

span.span: Renders the verbs in the footer area of a zone.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法呈現加入動詞命令和關閉的動詞命令的頁尾區域內區域。The method renders the add verb and the close verb within the footer area of a zone.

para.span: 方法不會處理任何自訂轉譯開發人員加入至自訂的物件區域。

span.span: The method does not handle the rendering for any custom objects that a developer adds to a custom zone.

para.span: 如果您想要新增自訂動詞類別，您必須繼承自類別，並覆寫方法，可用來呈現您的區域的自訂動詞命令。

span.span: If you want to add custom verbs to a class, you must inherit from the class, and override the method, which you can use to render the custom verbs for your zone.

para.span: 您也必須覆寫方法以處理事件時由使用者所按下的自訂動詞命令。

span.span: You must also override the method to handle the event when a custom verb is clicked by a user.

summary.span: 儲存在 Web 網頁回傳至伺服器以後發生的任何 控制項狀態變更。

span.span: Saves any changes in a control's state that occur after the Web page is posted back to the server.
An that contains the state data for the control.

returns.span: 如果狀態沒有變更，方法就會傳回 。

span.span: If there have been no changes to the state, the method returns .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法而言是不可或缺的控制項的作業 （例如索引或關鍵字） 且為個別控制項的檢視狀態資料從狀態資料。The method is concerned with state data that is essential for a control's operation (such as an index or keyword) and is separate from the control's view-state data. 方法會先呼叫基底的方法，來儲存控制項的現有狀態資料。The method first calls the base method to save the existing state data for the control. 接下來，它會判斷是否目前選取的區域中的控制項，藉由檢查是否屬性有值。Next, it determines whether a control in the zone is currently selected, by checking whether the property has a value. 如果沒有選取的控制項，方法會更新現有的狀態資料從選取的控制項狀態資料，然後傳回 狀態的所有資料。If there is a selected control, the method updates the existing state data with the state data from the selected control, and then returns all the state data.

para.span: 您可以選擇覆寫方法在衍生類別中的，以便您可以更新區域中的其他自訂物件的已儲存的控制項狀態。

span.span: You can optionally override the method in a derived class so that you can update the saved control state for other custom objects in the zone.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法呼叫基底方法，以儲存相關聯的檢視狀態區域。The method calls the base method to save the view state associated with the zone. 接下來，它會將儲存的新增和關閉的動詞，以及任何檢視狀態物件相關聯和屬性。Next, it saves any view state for the add and close verbs, as well as for the objects associated with the and the properties.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性可讓您設定目前選取您選擇的識別項控制項。The property allows you to set an identifier of your choice for the currently selected control. 這不會變更控制項的屬性值，因此您可以使用這個屬性，以程式設計方式供您自己。This does not change the control's property value, so you can use this property for your own programmatic purposes. 例如，如果您想要一律執行某些程式設計動作上目前所選控制項，這個屬性允許您透過您事先設定的已知值來存取該控制項。For example, if you wanted to always carry out some programmatic action on the currently selected control, this property enables you to access that control through a known value that you set in advance. 這個屬性無法由佈景主題或樣式表主題設定。This property cannot be set by themes or style sheet themes. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱和[ASP.NET 佈景主題和面板](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3)。For more information, see and [ASP.NET Themes and Skins](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用屬性以宣告方式和程式設計的方式。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property declaratively and programmatically. 若要執行範例所需的完整程式碼，請參閱 < 範例 > 一節的類別概觀。For the full code required to run the example, see the Example section of the class overview. 請注意，程式碼範例的第一個部分會宣告兩個``元素和第一個宣告的值屬性。Notice that the first part of the code example declares two `` elements, and the first one declares a value for the property. [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_CatalogZoneBase_Overview#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_CatalogZoneBase_Overview/CS/catalogzonebasecs.aspx#2)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_CatalogZoneBase_Overview#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_CatalogZoneBase_Overview/VB/catalogzonebasevb.aspx#2)] 在第二個部分的程式碼範例中，將文字值顯示目前選取的控制項屬性。In the second part of the code example, the text value for the property of the currently selected control is displayed. [!code-csharp[WebParts_CatalogZoneBase_Overview#6](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_CatalogZoneBase_Overview/CS/catalogzonebasecs.aspx#6)] [!code-vb[WebParts_CatalogZoneBase_Overview#6](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_CatalogZoneBase_Overview/VB/catalogzonebasevb.aspx#6)] 當您載入瀏覽器中的時，您可以選取**目錄**從下拉式清單，切換到 類別目錄的顯示模式。When you load the page in a browser, you can select **Catalog** from the drop-down list to switch to catalog display mode. 顯示類別目錄時，按一下其中一個連結控制項以選取它。When the catalog is visible, click one of the links to a control to select it. 然後按一下 [**顯示選取 CatalogPart 識別碼**] 按鈕以顯示屬性值。Then click the **Show Selected CatalogPart ID** button to display the property value. 請注意，屬性的值以宣告方式設定區域的值。Notice that the value of the property is the value that was set declaratively for the zone. 如果您選取其他區域中的控制項，相同的值會變成值選取時，每個控制項的屬性。If you select the other controls in the zone, the same value becomes the value of the property for each control when it is selected. 如果您未設定的值屬性，預設值的值一定是的目前選取的控制項屬性。If you do not set the value of the property, the default value is always the value of the property for the currently selected control.

value.span: 字串，包含顯示在區域選取控制項旁的文字。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在目錄 UI 第一次出現時，使用者可以選取其中一個控制項，例如，其中包含或可以加入至網頁上其他伺服器控制項。When the catalog UI first appears, users can select one of the controls, such as , that contains or other server controls that can be added to the Web page. 使用者會選取一個或多個控制項，並可以再使用控制類別目錄的頁尾區域中，並且選擇中要放置選取的伺服器控制項的頁面上的控制項。The user selects one or more controls, and can then use the control in the footer area of the catalog and choose the control on the page in which to place the selected server controls. 文字值屬性顯示旁控制項為簡單的指示。The text value of the property is displayed alongside the control as a simple instruction. 這個屬性的值設定時，可以自動儲存到資源檔使用設計工具。The value of this property, when set, can be saved automatically to a resource file by using a designer tool. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱和[全球化和當地語系化](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8ef3838e-9d05-4236-9dd0-ceecff9df80d)。For more information, see and [Globalization and Localization](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8ef3838e-9d05-4236-9dd0-ceecff9df80d). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用屬性以宣告方式和程式設計的方式。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property declaratively and programmatically. 若要執行範例所需的完整程式碼，請參閱 < 範例 > 一節的類別概觀。For the full code required to run the example, see the Example section of the class overview. 請注意，程式碼範例的第一個部分會宣告兩個``元素和第一個宣告的值屬性。Notice that the first part of the code example declares two `` elements, and the first one declares a value for the property. [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_CatalogZoneBase_Overview#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_CatalogZoneBase_Overview/CS/catalogzonebasecs.aspx#2)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_CatalogZoneBase_Overview#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_CatalogZoneBase_Overview/VB/catalogzonebasevb.aspx#2)] 在程式碼範例中，值的第二個屬性以程式設計方式變更。In the second part of the code example, the value of the property is changed programmatically. [!code-csharp[WebParts_CatalogZoneBase_Overview#5](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_CatalogZoneBase_Overview/CS/catalogzonebasecs.aspx#5)] [!code-vb[WebParts_CatalogZoneBase_Overview#5](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_CatalogZoneBase_Overview/VB/catalogzonebasevb.aspx#5)] 當您載入瀏覽器中的時，您可以選取**目錄**從下拉式清單，切換到 類別目錄的顯示模式。When you load the page in a browser, you can select **Catalog** from the drop-down list to switch to catalog display mode. 顯示類別目錄時，請注意旁邊顯示的文字在頁尾中的類別目錄的控制項。When the catalog is visible, note the text displayed alongside the control in the footer of the catalog. 您可以按一下**設定區域文字屬性**按鈕來變更屬性的文字值。You can click the **Set Zone Text Properties** button to change the text value of the property.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法會先呼叫基底方法類別來追蹤檢視狀態相關聯區域。The method first calls the base method in the class to track the view state associated with a zone. 接下來，這個方法一開始追蹤檢視狀態的新增或關閉的動詞命令，並將物件相關聯和屬性。Next, the method begins tracking the view state for the add and close verbs, as well as the objects associated with the and the properties.
